name: Drunk captain!
description:
The life of a pirate is not always that easy and glammy as you might think!
Somedays you need to figure out how to roll down the biggest mountain on the island without hurting yourself, and this is just one of those days!

Roll down and jump to avoid bottles, elks and other stuff along the way

Earn points for every successfull jump over and compete with players from all over the world on the epical highscore list!

All for free, so enjoy the spinning world of the Drunk Captain!
